name: Anti-Virus-WB12
description:
Welcome, user!

You are Anti-Virus-WB12! The only surviving part of the anti-virus work force! You must avoid the mini viruses within and anti-viruses workers that were corrupted. you must defeat the super virus Purple_Blue_Demon.Virus before it destroys your computer! But you must hurry your time is limited! Your anti-Virus protection software can only protect you for so long and you must not become disconnected from the protection system or you will slowly become like your co-workers!

controls:

A & D keys to move

Space to jump (twice to double jump)

drag and drop connection cube (with mouse/cursor) 

Forgot to put wall jumping in how to play

- jump between to walls (easiest)

- jump at and then move away from wall and move back towards (for 1 wall and alittle bit more harder)

Wall jumping in use just below!

Credits:

Unity - game engine

piskel - pixel art creating software
